MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.LbfgsBinaryClassificationExtensions.LogisticRegressionBinaryClassifier (ctx, label, features, weights, l1Weight, l2Weight, optimizationTolerance, memorySize, enoforceNoNegativity, advancedSettings, onFit)

Docs.param: The binary classificaiton context trainer object.
Memory size for . Low=faster, less accurate.
A delegate to apply all the advanced arguments to the algorithm.

A delegate that is called every time the method is called on the instance created out of this. This delegate will receive the linear model that was trained. Note that this action cannot change the result in any way; it is only a way for the caller to be informed about what was learnt.
Docs.summary: Predict a target using a linear binary classification model trained with the trainer.
